boardgame.name: Chronicle
Crónicas
クロニクル
boardgame.description: Box blurb translated from Japanese:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An irregular trick taking game where various individual abilities of persons forming history are tangled together._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Who will use their powers to adequately handle the events of the lands? Who will leave their name behind in The Chronicle?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the 2009 release from Kanai Factory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Recommended suggestions for beginners from the designer Seiji Kanai:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play with 3 or 4 players. 5 or 6 players make the game more difficult to control._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Until you are familiar with all the cards effects, remove the following History cards from the game: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dark age_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (have evil cards), _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Coronation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (use three next history cards) and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Meeting with a dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (use two previous history cards)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Use the optional rule _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;several history cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and draw 2 history cards per round. Each history card honour rewards is resolved independently._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Z-Man Games (ZMG 4071) An irregular trick taking game where various individual abilities of persons forming history are tangled together. Who will use their powers to adequately handle the events of the lands? Who will leave their name behind in The Chronicle?

NEGOZIO ONLINE GIOCHI DA TAVOLO, GIOCHI IN SCATOLA E GIOCHI DI SOCIETÀ. UPLAY Chronicle | Z-Man Games Nuovo, sigillato. Brand new and sealed. Spedizione in Italia 7,00€ (Chiedere per spedizioni combinate) Shipping to Europe 16,00€ (Ask for combined shipping) tel: (0039) 0507211814 customer care: bgg@uplay.it UPLAY di DXP S.N.C - Via Tosco Romagnola, 2585 - 56021 Titignano di Cascina (Pisa) P.IVA: IT01936340502 - R.e.a. Pisa PI - 167112

Zman Games - Chronicle Language: English Players: 3-6 Age: 12+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 0.130 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: An irregular trick taking game where various individual abilities of persons forming history are tangled together. Who will use their powers to adequately handle the events of the lands? Who will leave their name behind in The Chronicle? See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Brand New, factory sealed! A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard Shipping to USA48: $3.95 I will combine shipping to save you money when ordering multiple games. Standard shipping is USPS. Other shipping options are available upon request (Next Day / UPS / FEDEX). Contact for shipping quote. Alaska and Hawaii orders are shipped via USPS. International orders are shipped via USPS First Class (under 4 pounds) or USPS Priority Mail (up to 70 pounds per box). Contact for shipping quote. Orders ship within 1 business day from receipt of payment (5-10 day waiting period on personal checks). Ohio residents will be charged 6.5% sales tax. Thank-you, Mr. B ROCKIN’ B GAMES www.rockinbgames.com mrb.rockinbgames@gmail.com

9 cm * 7 cm * 3 cm, 0,3 kg Shipping: I prefer Hermes for shipping within Eu ( no discussion of weight and minor discussion of size and always with insurance! ). Besides EU I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship with DHL. As hint: Hermes: Longest side + shortest side = X Germany: X _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 37 cm: 4€; 37cm _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; X _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 50 cm: 5€; 50cm _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; X _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 80 cm: 6€; EU: X _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 30 cm: 10€; 30cm _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; X_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 50 cm: 14€; 50 cm _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; X_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 80 cm: 19€; DHL Europe\EU: small parcel ( 60cm*30cm+15cm, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;2kg, with insurance up to 50€) : 10€ parcel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 2kg, L + B + H _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 90cm, L _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 60 cm: 16€ parcel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt; 5Kg, 120cm*60cm*60cm: 27€; To reduce risk of damage I only will ship in an additional box. Drop me a line for further information. Payment by bank transfer (SEPA: IBAN _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; BIC). You can use paypal adding 5% fee.
